DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study concern diet male fertility lack . Observational study suggest diet rich fruit , vegetable meat may associate high sperm count . The investigator want see `` paleolithic diet '' consist meat , fish , fruit vegetable nut lack grain , legume dairy product improve sperm count .
DOC.brief_title: The Paleolithic Diet Male Factor Infertility
DOC.criteria: men male infertility willingness make dietary change three month willingness blind sperm test result end experiment High fever abdominal scrotal surgery three month prior intervention Change diet , drink smoke habit three month prior intervention regular consumption two serving alcohol day background ailment prevent dietary change
